parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To whisper, murmur, grumble (generally of smoldering discontent). Of uncertain derivation; to grumble.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A head of a household. From oikos and despotes; the head of a family.
